message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'm happy to take the lion's share, but I'm willing to negotiate.
I'm not afraid of a little risk, but I think we can do better than this. Your turn to make a move!
Let's find a middle ground, Bob. I'm willing to come down, but I'm not sure if your last offer was serious.
I think we're getting closer, but I still think I can do better. Your last offer was a bit too generous, if you ask me.
